channel.title: Advanced Features on Milkman
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Features on Milkman

item.title: Slack Integration
item.description: Milkman supports slack-integration via a slackbot. You can either host it yourself or use the heroku-hosted instance: Usage Once added to your workspace, you can share a private-bin export url via: /milkman <privatebin-url> Features It will nicely render the shared request and offers several ways for viewers to use the request, such as viewing the request as curl-command or http-request. Preview of a request in slack and users can choose how to view the request:
